content: 12 gauge 15 sts x 9 row unblocked= 4x4 in granny stitch not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 13 sizes xs s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x 5x to fit chest 32 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 62 actual measurements 37 25 40 5 43 75 50 53 56 5 59 75 66 69 25 this garment has an oversized relaxed fit and is meant to be worn with a 5-7 inch ease for a more fitted look
